model

Class Restaurant

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • model.Restaurant
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ObservableRestaurant
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ResClient, ResCook, ResWaiter

    public class Restaurant
extends java.util.Observable
implements ObservableRestaurant
    Super clase que se extenderá para las distintas terminales. Contiene los métodos comunes de ambas
    Author:
    Grupo 9
